# mediaPlaybackBehavior

**Instance Property**

Indicates whether HTML5 videos play inline or use the native full-screen controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var mediaPlaybackBehavior: WebPage.Configuration.MediaPlaybackBehavior
```
title: mediaPlaybackBehavior
